It completly baffles me how one could be so fucking STUPID

sure theres nothing in it before you aim at the window and shoot
Or even shake the gun and listen to hear if theres any BB's In It
Steve said he will pay for It so Its all good
But holy shit that kid cant get any stupider sometimes

Or I dont feel like being online
Im usually at james's because thats where my true friends are
The ones that dont like to cause drama or make me feel bad
The ones i can just hang our with
All day, watch TV and not be bored

In a empty room we could entertain ourselves all day

Just about the only problem I have there Is I cant hang

We have been doing that for four years

Ive pretty much given up on trying to find a girlfriend
It seems the ones Im interested In either dont like me
Have a boyfriend Or they love to make my life

Not to mention the fact that I HAVE A JOB
That should not be a reason for a girl not to like me
Ive had that one before and Its BS

1.I have a job and I work shitty hours So I may not

2.I have GREAT friends!

3. I HATE DRAMA!

I guess this entry Is long enough
Ill write again when I feel the need

Ok everyone Here Is the truth about the "Incident"

Me James Steve and Adam were hanging out killing time
We went to Lowes to fuck around
Went to BK to get some food
Went to JC Pennys to Fuck around
Went to annoy our friend Joe
And It ended up with Me and Adam riding on the truck of James's car on Butternut Ave.
We went to fast around a turn and Adam fell off and hit his head on the pavement
I was right next to him and It was either him Or both of us falling off
I tried everything I could possibally do to get him But It odviously didnt work
Adam was drove to Fulton then airlifted to Syracuse University Hospital
ONLY because It was a head injury
He really Is fine and should be out In a week or so
But anyways
After he was driven away Me James Steve and Jackie had to ride In seperate cars
Down to the Sheriff's Department for our "Statement" but they ended up keeping us there for FIVE FUCKING HOURS
Interrogating us INSISTING we were drunk or high even though we told them we werent several times
Imagine a Criminal Investigator and Two cops staring you In face while they INSIST you were smoking pot
Then trying to say James tried to kill Adam
Adam Is consious and speaking joking around HE IS FINE
Adam was the only one hurt
There were no drugs or alcohol
This Is NO-ONES fault at all
James has to go back Tuesday at 3pm
And the Investigator has my home number cell number and my adress and said he would call me sometime
To come back In for further "Questioning"
